rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MGC4230, MGF4000%, MGM4000, MGX4300}
Unit was previously coded {MGC4230, MGF4000%, MGM4000, MGX4300}
Must be enrolled in course version {0181}
Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181}

description: Topics selected for emphasis will alter as contemporary issues change. The study of great ideas in management on motivation, job design, human resource management, ethics, social responsibility, leadership, production/operations management, business policy, strategy, and the management process are explored through the study of the works of major management scholars.
